title: Mexico City
description: Mexico City, or the City of Mexico, is the capital of Mexico. As an "alpha" global city, Mexico City is one of the most important financial centers in the Americas. It is located in the Valley of Mexico, a large valley in the high plateaus at the center of Mexico, at an altitude of 2,240 metres.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
